languages.text: "И это случилось благодаря тебе, шерин. Ты не отверг{mf||ла} меня, и я перестала задаваться вопросом, достойна ли я быть рядом с тобой. Я достойна, и я знаю это". {n}Спокойный голос исполнен уверенности, вальяжной силы и, в то же время, трепетной нежности. Он ласкает и обтекает вас.{/n}

"And it is thanks to you, shereen. You did not cast me aside, and I have stopped asking myself if I am worthy of you. I am worthy, and I know it." {n}Her voice is calm and resolute, full of unshakeable self-assurance and, at the same time, tremulous tenderness. It washes over you in a gentle caress.{/n}
languages.original_text: "И это случилось благодаря тебе, шерин. Ты не отверг{mf||ла} меня, и я перестала задаваться вопросом, достойна ли я быть рядом с тобой. Я достойна, и я знаю это". {n}Спокойный голос исполнен уверенности, вальяжной силы и, в то же время, трепетной нежности. Он ласкает и обтекает вас.{/n}

I am worthy, and I know it." {n}Her voice is calm and resolute, full of unshakeable self-assurance and, at the same time, tremulous tenderness. It washes over you in a gentle caress.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "And it is thanks to you, shereen. You did not cast me aside, and I have stopped asking myself if I am worthy of you. I am worthy, and I know it." {n}Her voice is calm and resolute, full of unshakeable self-assurance and, at the same time, tremulous tenderness. It washes over you in a gentle caress.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “而这一切都要多亏了你，亲爱的。你并没有抛弃我，我也不再质疑自己究竟是否配得上你。我配得上你，我很清楚。”{n}她的声音平静而坚定，充满了不可动摇的自信，同时又带着颤抖的温柔。她的声音仿佛轻柔的爱抚，拂过你的灵魂。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And it is thanks to you, shereen. You did not cast me aside, and I have stopped asking myself if I am worthy of you. I am worthy, and I know it." {n}Her voice is calm and resolute, full of unshakeable self-assurance and, at the same time, tremulous tenderness. It washes over you in a gentle caress.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “而这一切都要多亏了你，亲爱的。你并没有抛弃我，我也不再质疑自己究竟是否配得上你。我配得上你，我很清楚。”{n}她的声音平静而坚定，充满了不可动摇的自信，同时又带着颤抖的温柔。她的声音仿佛轻柔的爱抚，拂过你的灵魂。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「それはあんたのおかげなの、シャリーン。あんたはあたしを追いやることはしなかったし、あたしはあんたにふさわしいかどうか自問するのをやめた。そう、あたしはふさわしいんだ、当たり前じゃない」{n} 彼女の声は穏やかでありながらも毅然としており、揺るぎない自己肯定感と同時に、震えるような優しさに満ちているた。それは優しい愛撫のようにあなたを包み込む。{/n}
languages.original_text: "And it is thanks to you, shereen. You did not cast me aside, and I have stopped asking myself if I am worthy of you. I am worthy, and I know it." {n}Her voice is calm and resolute, full of unshakeable self-assurance and, at the same time, tremulous tenderness. It washes over you in a gentle caress.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「それはあんたのおかげなの、シャリーン。あんたはあたしを追いやることはしなかったし、あたしはあんたにふさわしいかどうか自問するのをやめた。そう、あたしはふさわしいんだ、当たり前じゃない」{n} 彼女の声は穏やかでありながらも毅然としており、揺るぎない自己肯定感と同時に、震えるような優しさに満ちているた。それは優しい愛撫のようにあなたを包み込む。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Es todo gracias a usted, shereen. No me ha rechazado y he dejado de preguntarme si soy digna de usted. Lo soy y lo sé». {n}Su voz es tranquila y decidida, llena de una confianza inquebrantable y una ternura trémula. Te cubre como una amable caricia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And it is thanks to you, shereen. You did not cast me aside, and I have stopped asking myself if I am worthy of you. I am worthy, and I know it." {n}Her voice is calm and resolute, full of unshakeable self-assurance and, at the same time, tremulous tenderness. It washes over you in a gentle caress.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es todo gracias a usted, shereen. No me ha rechazado y he dejado de preguntarme si soy digna de usted. Lo soy y lo sé». {n}Su voz es tranquila y decidida, llena de una confianza inquebrantable y una ternura trémula. Te cubre como una amable caricia.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « C'est grâce à vous, shereen. Vous ne m'avez pas mise de côté et j'ai arrêté de me demander si j'étais digne de vous. Je suis digne, et je le sais. » {n}Sa voix calme et déterminée est empreinte aussi bien de tendresse que d'une assurance inébranlable. Elle vous enveloppe comme une douce caresse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And it is thanks to you, shereen. You did not cast me aside, and I have stopped asking myself if I am worthy of you. I am worthy, and I know it." {n}Her voice is calm and resolute, full of unshakeable self-assurance and, at the same time, tremulous tenderness. It washes over you in a gentle caress.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est grâce à vous, shereen. Vous ne m'avez pas mise de côté et j'ai arrêté de me demander si j'étais digne de vous. Je suis digne, et je le sais. » {n}Sa voix calme et déterminée est empreinte aussi bien de tendresse que d'une assurance inébranlable. Elle vous enveloppe comme une douce caresse.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Und das habe ich Euch zu verdanken, Shereen. Ihr habt mich nicht aufgeben und ich frage mich nicht mehr, ob ich Eurer würdig bin. Ich bin würdig und das weiß ich." {n}Ihre Stimme klingt ruhig und entschlossen, und zeigt gleichermaßen unerschütterliches Selbstbewusstsein und ängstliche Zärtlichkeit. Sie durchströmt dich wie eine sanfte Liebkosung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And it is thanks to you, shereen. You did not cast me aside, and I have stopped asking myself if I am worthy of you. I am worthy, and I know it." {n}Her voice is calm and resolute, full of unshakeable self-assurance and, at the same time, tremulous tenderness. It washes over you in a gentle caress.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Und das habe ich Euch zu verdanken, Shereen. Ihr habt mich nicht aufgeben und ich frage mich nicht mehr, ob ich Eurer würdig bin. Ich bin würdig und das weiß ich." {n}Ihre Stimme klingt ruhig und entschlossen, und zeigt gleichermaßen unerschütterliches Selbstbewusstsein und ängstliche Zärtlichkeit. Sie durchströmt dich wie eine sanfte Liebkosung.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "And it is thanks to you, shereen. You did not cast me aside, and I have stopped asking myself if I am worthy of you. I am worthy, and I know it." {n}Her voice is calm and resolute, full of unshakeable self-assurance and, at the same time, tremulous tenderness. It washes over you in a gentle caress.{/n}

languages.text: "Üstelik bu senin sayende şirinim. Beni bir kenara atmadın ve ben de sana layık olup olmadığımı sorgulamayı bıraktım. Sana layığım ve bunun farkındayım." {n}Sesi; sakin ve kararlı, sarsılmaz bir öz güvenle dolu ve aynı zamanda ürkek bir yumuşaklığa da sahip. Bu ses seni sarmalayıp nazikçe okşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "And it is thanks to you, shereen. You did not cast me aside, and I have stopped asking myself if I am worthy of you. I am worthy, and I know it." {n}Her voice is calm and resolute, full of unshakeable self-assurance and, at the same time, tremulous tenderness. It washes over you in a gentle caress.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ve bu, senin sayende şirinim. Beni bir kenara atmadın ve ben de sana layık olup olmadığımı sorgulamayı bıraktım. Sana layığım ve bunun farkındayım." {n}Sesi sakin ve kararlı, sarsılmaz bir öz güvenle dolu ve aynı zamanda ürkek bir yumuşaklığa da sahip. Bu ses seni sarmalıyor ve nazikçe okşuyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
